name: weak-armor
effect:
Whenever a physical move hits this Pokémon, its Speed rises one stage and its Defense falls one stage.

This ability triggers on every hit of a multiple-hit move.
short_effect: Raises Speed and lowers Defense by one stage each upon being hit by a physical move.

flavor_text_entries.black-white:
Physical attacks lower
Defense and raise Speed.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
Physical attacks lower
Defense and raise Speed.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
Physical attacks lower its Defense
stat and raise its Speed stat.

stat and raise its Speed stat.

flavor_text_entries.scarlet-violet: The Pokémon's Defense stat is lowered when it takes damage from physical moves, but its Speed stat is sharply boosted.
